07 Mar 2025

6 New Mystery & Thriller Novels for Fans of Dean Kloontz

If you’re a fan of Dean Koontz’s gripping thrillers and edge-of-your-seat mysteries, these six new novels are for you! Packed with suspense, unexpected twists, and pulse-pounding tension, these books will keep you guessing until the very last page. Get ready for a wild ride—your next thrilling read awaits!

Nest of Thieves

by Jules Adrienn

Release Date: February 28 2025

Conor Monroe wants more out of life than a broken family and penny-ante robberies. Julia Terranova is running from an old life, trying to stay one step ahead of her abusive ex. Together they might find an answer to their problems. But when a contract on Conor’s life brings a new face to town, staying alive is their one and only problem.

Buy on Amazon

Mr. Whisper (The Specialists Book 1)

by Andrew Mayne

Release Date: March 1 2025

Four brilliant investigators combine forces to outwit an insidious master of online mind control in a gripping thriller by the Wall Street Journal bestselling author of The Final Equinox.

Buy on Amazon

You Killed Me First

by John Marrs

Release Date: March 4 2025

It’s 5 November, and a woman awakens to a nightmare. Bound and gagged, she lies trapped in the heart of a towering bonfire. As the smoke thickens, panic sets in – she’s moments away from being engulfed in flames. How did it come to this?

Buy on Amazon

Missing in Flight

by Audrey J. Cole

Release Date: March 1 2025

From USA Today bestselling author Audrey J. Cole comes a harrowing thriller about a woman faced with the unthinkable, when her infant goes missing aboard a plane to New York.

Buy on Amazon

Gravewater Lake

by A.M. Strong

Release Date: March 1 2025

A woman who can’t remember her past encounters a mysterious stranger in a chilling novel of mounting psychological suspense by the authors of The Last Girl Left.

Buy on Amazon

Shadow’s Collision (Shadow Island FBI Mystery Series Book 19)

by Mary Stone

Release Date: February 28 2025

With half the puzzle pieces missing and the other half reduced to ash, Rebecca and her team must fight fire with fire, all while watching her back as the past closes in. Because a cornered man with nothing left to lose isn’t just the most dangerous thing on the planet—he won’t go down alone. He’ll take everyone with him.

Buy on Amazon
